name: OC_MarkdownView
summary: MarkdownView is a markdown render like swift-markdown-ui but write in ObjectiveC.
description: MarkdownView is a simple and easy-to-use Markdown rendering view for iOS, written in Objective-C. It supports most of the GFM Markdown styles. The project references [swift-markdown-ui]( https://github.com/gonzalezreal/swift-markdown-ui). Thanks to the author of swift-markdown-ui; this project aims to provide similar functionality in Objective-C.
